headline: Big Beautiful Bill Weighs On Hospitals, Renewables Before Vote; S&P 500 Futures Rise
summary: President Donald Trump's One Big Beautiful Bill Act is expected to come to a vote in the Senate today and clear the House as soon as Wednesday.  The Senate also took a tougher line on renewable energy tax credits, which prompted Tesla CEO Elon Musk to weigh in against the bill.  The reality of the bill's tough trade-offs burst into the open on Sunday night, as Sen. Thom Tillis (R-N.C.) denounced Medicaid provisions that he said would cost his state $26 billion in support and kick 663,000 North Carolinians off their health plans.

raw.headline: Big Beautiful Bill Weighs On Hospitals, Renewables Before Vote; S&P 500 Futures Rise
raw.summary: President Donald Trump's One Big Beautiful Bill Act is expected to come to a vote in the Senate today and clear the House as soon as Wednesday.  The Senate also took a tougher line on renewable energy tax credits, which prompted Tesla CEO Elon Musk to weigh in against the bill.  The reality of the bill's tough trade-offs burst into the open on Sunday night, as Sen. Thom Tillis (R-N.C.) denounced Medicaid provisions that he said would cost his state $26 billion in support and kick 663,000 North Carolinians off their health plans.

headline: Tesla's V4 superchargers begin operation in China
summary: Tesla's first batch of V4 superchargers has begun operation in China, covering Shanghai, Chongqing, Gansu and Zhejiang provinces, the U.S. automaker said on Monday. The superchargers will gradually be deployed in Beijing, Guangdong province and other Chinese localities and will be open to other electric vehicle brands, the automaker said.

headline: Congressman Says 'Nobody Asked For The IRS To Be Americans' Tax Preparer,' Applauds Efforts To Shut Down The IRS Direct File Program
summary: Rep. Jason Smith (R-MO) is celebrating the House-passed bill that would shut down the Internal Revenue Service Direct File program, a free federal tool that allows Americans to file taxes online without paying private companies. “Nobody asked for the IRS to be Americans' tax preparer, filer, and auditor,” Smith posted on X on June 24. “The House-passed One, Big, Beautiful Bill puts an end to the IRS Direct File Program.” The Program Had Strong Support From Voters And Users Nobody asked for the I
